channel.title: Create new font
channel.description:
Hi guys, im finishing my bot for goonzu online and i haven't found any info on how to create new fonts, because the ones avaible are only for rs.
Ty Vans

item.title: Create new font
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Vans:

Any tip for making the images? do i have to leave a space or something?

No, I don’t think so. But maybe it might depend on the number of pixels in between each letter. You will have to do a lot of process of elimination.

Read full topic

item.title: Create new font
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

You need to take a screenshot of all the letters for that game. Then make each picture be another letter. Like the letter A (uppercase) would be a picture itself and you would need to call it 65.bmp.

Here are the rest of the file names for each letter picture.

A = 65.bmp B = 66.bmp C = 67.bmp D = 68.bmp E = 69.bmp F = 70.bmp G = 71.bmp H = 72.bmp I = 73.bmp J = 74.bmp K = 75.bmp L = 76.bmp M = 77.bmp N = 78.bmp O = 79.bmp P = 80.bmp Q = 81.bmp R = 82.bmp S = 83.bmp T = 84.bmp U = 85.bmp V = 86.bmp W = 87.bmp X = 88.bmp Y = 89.bmp Z = 90.bmp a = 97.bmp b = 98.bmp c = 99.bmp e = 101.bmp d = 100.bmp e = 101.bmp f = 102.bmp g = 103.bmp h = 104.bmp i = 105.bmp j = 106.bmp k = 107.bmp l = 108.bmp m = 109.bmp n = 110.bmp o = 111.bmp p = 112.bmp q = 113.bmp r = 114.bmp s = 115.bmp t = 116.bmp u = 117.bmp v = 118.bmp w = 119.bmp x = 120.bmp y = 121.bmp z = 122.bmp 0 = 48.bmp 1 = 49.bmp 2 = 50.bmp 3 = 51.bmp 4 = 52.bmp 5 = 53.bmp 6 = 54.bmp 7 = 55.bmp 8 = 56.bmp 9 = 57.bmp

Got that by running my scar script, you can add characters or do whatever to it if you like.

program New;

var
  i : integer;
  s : string;

begin
  ClearDebug;
  s := 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcedefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789';
  for i := 1 to Length(s) do
    WriteLn(s[i] + ' = ' + IntToStr(Ord(s[i])) + '.bmp');
end.

~Ron

Read full topic
